A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Excellent film.  Felt like a good middle stanza. Plot twists\, excitement\, thrills\, good acting great special effects. Felt like a star wars movie should but had it's own unique edge. I liked the comedy\, too. Good allusions towards empire strikes back\, but not as heavy handed as TFA was to NAH. Ignore the naysayers. They are either fanboys upset that their comic book shop talk theories were wrong\, or they are the types of people who hate everything. Fantastic film. 9.7/10
